item.title: Broken tap at 269 Green Lanes, 22nd December
item.description:
Water has been gushing out of the tap since overnight Sunday to Monday and is ongoing. Fire brigade can’t turn the water off. Thames Water says it is not its issue. The site is owner by SNG. We can’t access the block due to the water egress.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Green Lanes, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large sofa and rubbish dumped outside flats, 22nd December

item.title: Previous report 8573464, 22nd December
item.description:
In the report mentioned, I have requested that I get confirmation that the overhanging branches be trimmed. Now I know these will not be taken care of by the council, how do I seek approval to trim them myself? How do I also get confirmation that the roots are not creating the crack in my garden wall? Can someone please contact me?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Village Way, Eden Park, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black bin liners on pavement, 22nd December
item.description:
There are some black bin liners of a commercial type that have been dumped on the pavement next to my house at 186 Peckham Rye, SE22 9QA. There is some other rubbish that has been dumped outside the building behind our property. Please can this be removed.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 44b, The Gardens, East Dulwich, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: 42 peckham grove, 22nd December
item.description:
This report concerns repeated illegal disposal of waste on private property. The individual parks on the public road outside my house and then enters my enclosed property without permission to dispose of rubbish in our private bins, which are not for public use. This has happened on multiple occasions and has been recorded on video. The behaviour is unauthorised and ongoing.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 52, Peckham Grove, Old Kent Road, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
